name: Slime Crunch
description: Slime Crunch is a 2D Platformer game where the player has one goal: Crunch slimes. Featuring 18 levels which span across six biomes, Slime Crunch provides a varied and challenging experience in every level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0GHz + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
